items.text: full outside off, big stride ahead and fended by Raza. Shows the full face of the bat, which is always promising
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.preText: Hat-trick ball coming up. Ervine will face this delivery. Two slips and a short leg
items.text: so close, but nope! Good length outside off, but it's the straight one. Zips straight through past the bat's outside edge
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Ervine, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, comes down the ground and taps it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Ervine, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, and it's been swept away! Beats square leg, and then the man at deep fine leg as well
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Ervine, FOUR runs

items.text: good length outside off, shimmies down before tapping this back to Shakib
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Ervine, no run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, spins into Ervine. The ball stays low, but punched off the back foot to mid on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Ervine, 1 run

items.preText: Mustafa Moudi: "Sikandar Raza career runs is now equivalent to his birth year - 1986!"
items.text: full outside off, and it's been smacked over the bowler's head! Comes down the wicket and gets under the ball. Lifted over mid off as the ball crashes into the boundary
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sikandar Raza, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on middle and off, punched off the back foot to Mashrafe. Played with soft hands
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, no run

items.text: sharp take from first slip! Back of a length on off stump, he goes chasing behind the ball that's angling away. Takes a thick outside edge, and the ball was dipping on the fielder, but he dives forward to complete an excellent catch. Zimbabwe in big trouble
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Ervine, OUT

dismissal.text: CR Ervine c Sabbir Rahman b Mashrafe Mortaza 11 (15b 2x4 0x6) SR: 73.33

items.text: good length outside off, played off the back foot towards cover. Hit with the straight bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, no run

items.preText: Noor: "Is it possible for Shakib to go to number 1 in all rounder ranking in One Day Internationals today?" -- Impossible to determine that right now
items.text: short ball just outside off, gets big on Moor as he tries to defend with soft hands. But the ball goes past his bat's outside edge
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off, pokes at it and makes enough contact behind that shot. Finds the gap between cover and point, and races away after that. No chance for the infielder who tries to chase behind it
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length outside off, tapped off the back foot but takes a thick outside edge. Trickles down to third man instead
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Moor, 1 run

items.preText: Atiq: "Now the only remaining danger is Raza. If BD can take his wicket early enough I don't see any reason to loose the match." -- Here's the second Powerplay. Shakib to continue
items.text: good length on off stump, angling into the right hander as he plays for the turn. Sneaks through between bat and pad as he attempts to defend. Hits his pads, and it's a big appeal for lbw. Given by the umpire, but Moor reviews! Replays show there's an inside edge off the bat. No wonder he reviewed so fast
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Moor, no run

items.text: tossed up full outside off, big stride forward and defended with soft hands
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Moor, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump, tentatively works it towards the leg side but misses the shot. Hits his pad instead
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Moor, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, punched with ease off the back foot past the bowler's right
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Moor, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, winds up and cuts, but it's in the air! Falls just short of point, and spins away from the fielder. There's the man in the deep, though
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Sikandar Raza, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, defends off the front foot but comes off the inside edge. Ricochets onto his boots, but does not trickle onto the stumps
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Moor, no run

items.preText: Mustafa Moudi: "Shakib tried hard to come closer in the Career Wickets to Mortaza, But even Mortaza is adamant to keep the gap unchanged. And as a result of this competition, Zimbabwe is losing wickets !!"
items.text: good length on off stump, he shuffles across to the off side and flicks it to deep midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, 2 runs

items.preText: Hasib: "Although Shakib missed the hat trick but he might not miss the 'Man of the Match' Hat trick!!!"
items.text: good length outside off, Sikandar pokes at it but can't make contact. The ball holds its line as it zips past the bat's outside edge. Groans from the keeper and the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, punched off the back foot to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: full outside off, and it's a slower ball on this occasion. It's too wide for Raza to chase at it. Left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.text: full outside off, walks across to the off side and taps it with the bat's open face to cover point. Can't beat the infield
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, no run

items.preText: amit velingkar: "Where is Sean Williams??" -- In Zimbabwe
items.text: short outside off, and Raza walks across to the off side and pulls emphatically! Great sound off the bat, and the ball soars over the deep midwicket boundary. Was quick to get into position early, and then went through with the shot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sikandar Raza, SIX runs
